column4: It's got a larger number of people working on it than any other Debian-based distribution
Nobody outside Debian is going to turn Debian into something with a 6-month release cycle
There is no entirely free Debian-based distribution that's intended as a general-purpose system and which doesn't have Bruce Perens, no
I got on with him fine in person, and he may well be better than he was back in the Debian days, but he has a legendarily bad reputation for ease of cooperation
